refnamediv.refpurpose: Conditional branch during p-time depending on elapsed note time.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Conditional branch during p-time depending on elapsed note time. istrt and idur specify time in seconds. The branch to label will become effective at time istrt, and will remain so for just idur seconds. Note that timout can be reinitialized for multiple activation within a single note (see example under reinit).

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: where label is in the same instrument block and is not an expression.
